subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|雄兎|おす.うさぎ}}: a [[male]] rabbit
* {{ja-r|雌兎|めす.うさぎ}}: a [[female]] rabbit
* {{ja-r|子兎|こ.うさぎ}}: a [[baby]] [[rabbit]] or [[hare]]; a [[kitten]]
* {{ja-r|小兎|こ.うさぎ}}: a [[small]] [[rabbit]] or [[hare]]
* {{ja-r|大兎|おお.うさぎ}}: a [[large]] [[rabbit]] or [[hare]]
* {{ja-r|野兎|の.うさぎ}}: a [[wild]] [[rabbit]] or [[hare]]
* {{ja-r|家兎|いえ.うさぎ}}: a [[domestic]] rabbit or hare; a [[pet]] rabbit
* {{ja-r|守株待兎|しゅしゅたいと}}: (1) [[watch]] a [[stock]] and [[wait]] a rabbit; (2) [[trust]] a [[windfall]]

subSections.title: Etymology
